item.description:
To all of our South Shore Social Fun members:

Want to dance off all that Halloween candy and hear some great music at a terrific venue?

Then come on down to the C Note on Nantasket Beach to hear a great soul, funk and R&B band, The Chicken Slacks.  The Slacks always bring it each and every Thursday night at the Cantab Lounge in Cambridge, but a Saturday night show at the C Note is a great way to fill in your dance card between Halloween and Thanksgiving.

Come on out and shake it with The Chicken Slacks!

Notes:

  • Cover charge is $10 at the door.
  • Not familiar with the Slacks?  Check them out on their website or their Facebook page.
  • I'll be at the C Note at 8:30 p.m.  As noted above, I look like my profile picture, I'll be hanging at the bar and I'll also email my cell # to all Yes RSVPers on the afternoon of the show.
  • There's ample parking across the street from the C Note in a large public lot.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my profile picture. I'll be hanging at the bar and I'll also email my cell # to all Yes RSVPers on the afternoon of the show.
item.name: The Chicken Slacks @ The C Note in Hull
